0: The staff was very friendly and helpful
The hotel has a gem in their polside bartender for his customer service ability
Location and shuttle service to the Indian wells tennis garden
Hotel employee in the Lounge was knowledgeable and entertaining
Pool Staff Room everything was amazing
The hotel was beautiful and the customer service fantastic
We had several catered events Rehearsal dinner Welcome party Reception and brunch
Other than that very pleasant atmosphere and staff
1: I booked a suite and the front desk stated it was misrepresented by the site I booked the room on
Front desk service was a 3 poor
The vacancy was high but front staff refused to upgrade
This is however advertised as a full service resort
Anyway we called room service like they told us to and it took another hour to get them
Motel level and very bad service
So at this point our impression is that the staff at Miramonte are unprofessional and communicate inaccurate information
This is an outright lie as we had the front desk clerk read us the notes during check out
The staff at check in did not highly value customer service or know how to do it adequately
